m_szDocTitle: Japanese Solar Energy Sector Fast Approaching Cost-Revenue Parity | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Japanese Solar Energy Sector Fast Approaching Cost-Revenue Parity June 18th, 2015 by James Ayre   Japan’s solar energy sector is fast approaching profitability, ahead of impending feed-in-tariff (FiT) cuts, according to the Japan Renewable Energy Foundation. To be more specific here, the Japan Renewable Energy Foundation (JREF) is expecting cost-revenue parity to be reached, and profitability to be achieved, sometime earlier than the second half of 2015. Given that Japan’s Ministry of Economy, Trade, and Industry, will be cutting FiT rates by 16% in July, the prediction is especially worth not
